body: Amphibians & Reptiles          Amphibians and reptiles can often act as indicators of the health of an ecosystem. An inventory of these animals at Stones River National Battlefield confirmed the presence of 29 species in the park.Amphibian and Reptile Inventory at Stones River National Battlefield      List of Amphibians and Reptiles at Stones River National Battlefield
title: Stones River National Battlefield: Amphibians
